answers.answer: Plexus dulls your appetite; you may be having low blood sugar because you aren't eating enough food; same could happen with blood pressure, but you should talk to your doctor to be sure there isn't some thing else wrong.I did a quick search of Plexus Slim and it's supposed to be diabetic friendly, though I wouldn't necessarily trust it.Are you diabetic?  Why would you have checked your blood sugar?

Well I have had a lot of blood sugar issues after having gestational diabetes in 2005. I have tried weight watchers and different ones and it starts messing with blood sugar levels and then I get scared and its been off and on since 2005 and been to several drs and had several tests and still nothing. I am getting so depressed because of it and I was going to go to mayo clinic but can't afford to go.

question: I have been on plexus for 3 days and last night I was having low blood sugar and todat low blood pressure. I need to know if I should stop plexus or continue.
title: plexus issues please help
